description.narrative: By 2018, coverage of birth and death notification and registration increased., which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2018, more vulnerable individuals and families demand for, and benefit from integrated child protection and justice services.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, coverage of birth and death notification and registration increased.

description.narrative: Capacities of justice, social welfare, health, education and police professionals were strengthened through cascaded training and exploratory learning approaches to handle online and offline child sexual offences, resulting in better coordinated and more successful handling of child abuse cases. | Status:Met | As-of Date:27/12/2018

title.narrative: # of constituencies implementing at least one prevention of violence against children activity

actual.value: 2017:12 constituencies (10 Galz & Goals and 2 where Child Line Life Line conducted awareness raising against child online abuse and exploitation). The anti-bullying campaign was implemented nationwide.

title.narrative: # of regions with improved multi-sectoral response package of services for victims of sexual violence in place

target.value: 2017:One stop service capacity in 2 GBVPUs improved

actual.value: 2018:SOPs not finalized to be distributed to staff who are dealing with GBV/VAC cases in the 5 regions who received training

title.narrative: # of reported child cases of sexual violence who receive multi-sectoral support services
